parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number doesn't automatically disqualify it as propaganda, it suggests it might not be directly linked to an official campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions Mohammad Murad, a candidate from AUR for a deputy mandate. This directly identifies a parliamentary candidate, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, the content is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c" regarding addressing the public.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post discusses Murad's candidacy, his party's proposals for the parliamentary elections, and the results of the first round of presidential elections.  The clear intention is to promote Murad and, by extension, AUR. This strongly suggests an electoral objective, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c". The mention of the presidential elections, while not directly related to the parliamentary elections, is used to contextualize and support Murad's candidacy.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>While the post is presented in a format resembling a news interview, its primary purpose is not objective journalism. The focus is on promoting a specific candidate and party, not providing balanced information.  The framing of the interview favors the candidate.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a promotional piece for a candidate and party.  The interview format is used as a vehicle for electoral propaganda.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1618099118787045</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria of electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific parliamentary candidate (Mohammad Murad), is intended for a wide audience via a paid Facebook post, and has a clear electoral objective: promoting the candidate and his party, AUR.  While presented as an interview, the content lacks the objectivity expected of journalistic reporting and serves primarily as a promotional tool. The timing of the post, even if within the legal timeframe for electoral propaganda, is crucial.  The post's focus on the parliamentary elections and its promotional nature strongly suggest it is electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Mohammad Murad</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>AUR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Tomis Tv, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 1618099118787045) cu conținut electoral, care promovează candidatura lui Mohammad Murad din partea AUR pentru alegerile parlamentare. Postarea, prezentată sub forma unui interviu, nu respectă standardele jurnalismului obiectiv, ci servește drept instrument de propagandă electorală, având ca efect influențarea votului în favoarea candidatului menționat.  Conținutul postării, care face referire explicită la candidatura lui Murad și la propunerile AUR pentru alegerile parlamentare, demonstrează clar intenția de a influența electoratul.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
